recipes.title: Grilled Paneer with Smoky Paprika Quinoa
recipes.description: A dinner-friendly British dish featuring paneer and quinoa with a smoky paprika twist.
steps: Prep ingredients: wash produce and chopped aromatics.
Grilled the paneer with salt, pepper, and smoky paprika profile until nearly cooked.
Cook the quinoa separately according to package directions; drain well.
Sauté vegetables in fat until tender-crisp.
Combine paneer, vegetables, and quinoa; add sauce and simmer to coat.
Taste and adjust seasoning (salt, acid, heat).
Rest 3–5 minutes, garnish, and serve warm.
